DOC.criteria: Patients primary hypercholesterolemia mixed dyslipidemia moderate high CV risk accord Chinese Dyslipidemia Guideline ( 2007 ) . Not achieve lipid treatment goal despite follow cholesterol restrictive diet and/or lipid lower monotherapy improperly prior Visit 1 ( inclusion 6week openlabel study phase ) . Not achieve lipid treatment goal stable dose Fluvastatin sodium Immediate Release Capsule 40 mg QD 6 week openlabel study phase ( inclusion 12week doubleblind study phase ) . Patients know hypersensitivity fluvastatin excipients . Dyslipidemia secondary cause . Known muscle disease history muscle disease and/or serum CPK level great 2 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) . A history evidence Acute Myocardial infarction ( AMI ) , unstable angina ( UA ) Coronary artery bypass surgery Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) within previous 8 week . Active liver disease and/or serum transaminase level ( ALT , AST ) great 1.5 x ULN .
